name: SquareRunner
description:
My Entry for the ScoreSpaceJam#19 

(Heads up the controls may take a few attempts to get the hang of)

The theme for the Game Jam was "Parkour" so I made a 2d Endless parkour game that includes an  online leader board

The Game was a lot of fun to work on and I am honestly pretty proud of my first game I am releasing  so I hope you enjoy it

Feel free to subscribe to my YouTube channel StonkZombie I upload mostly just me playing games with friends and Live Streams  but also I plan on uploading videos about my games as well!

Also  Do not worry if you get a good score but didn't set a name at the start you can just change it and it will update

CONTROLS

move using arrow keys or wasd 

Holding up makes you jump or hover(if already in air)(Height Jumped is based on how long the key is held)

Moving down allows you to fall faster 

left and right make you move left and right

press c to change your name on the leader board

Credits:

All of the assets,music and code were made by me (StonkZombie)
